attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned require the Government to build an effective sea defense at Hemsby Norfolk and to compensate those who have lost their homes as a result of previously refusing this.

If anyone would like to donate to save hemsby coastline, you can pay via barclays pingit ..shortcode pingitemy596 - it is free to use.....or send a cheque made payable to save hemsby coastline via the lacon arms...Save Hemsby Coastline Bank account is also Barclays
Sort code is 20-53-06
Account number is 23898857

Please show your support! Every little helps!
